00001 /* double (precision) TRiangular Matrices */

00003 #include "dtrMatrix.h"

00005 SEXP triangularMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00006 {
00007     SEXP val = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym);
00008 
00009     if (LENGTH(val) < 2)
00010         return mkString(_("'Dim' slot has length less than two"));
00011     if (INTEGER(val)[0] != INTEGER(val)[1])
00012         return mkString(_("Matrix is not square"));
00013     if (isString(val = check_scalar_string(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_uploSym),
00014                                            "LU", "uplo"))) return val;
00015     if (isString(val = check_scalar_string(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_diagSym),
00016                                            "NU", "diag"))) return val;
00017     return ScalarLogical(1);
00018 }

00020 SEXP dtrMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00021 {
00022     /* since "dtr" inherits from "triangular", and "dMatrix", only need this:*/
00023     return dense_nonpacked_validate(obj);
00024 }

00027 static
00028 double get_norm(SEXP obj, const char *typstr)
00029 {
00030     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00031     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym));
00032     double *work = (double *) NULL;
00033 
00034     typnm[0] = La_norm_type(typstr);
00035     if (*typnm == 'I') {
00036         work = (double *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(double));
00037     }
00038     return F77_CALL(dlantr)(typnm, uplo_P(obj), diag_P(obj), dims, dims+1,
00039                             REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)), dims, work);
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 SEXP dtrMatrix_norm(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00044 {
00045     return ScalarReal(get_norm(obj, CHAR(asChar(type))));
00046 }
00047 
00048 SEXP dtrMatrix_rcond(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00049 {
00050     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00051     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00052     double rcond;
00053 
00054     typnm[0] = La_rcond_type(CHAR(asChar(type)));
00055     F77_CALL(dtrcon)(typnm, uplo_P(obj), diag_P(obj), dims,
00056                      REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)), dims, &rcond,
00057                      (double *) R_alloc(3*dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00058                      (int *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(int)), &info);
00059     return ScalarReal(rcond);
00060 }
00061 
00062 SEXP dtrMatrix_solve(SEXP a)
00063 {
00064     SEXP val = PROTECT(duplicate(a));
00065     int info, *Dim = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00066     F77_CALL(dtrtri)(uplo_P(val), diag_P(val), Dim,
00067                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), Dim, &info);
00068     UNPROTECT(1);
00069     return val;
00070 }
00071 
00072 SEXP dtrMatrix_chol2inv(SEXP a)
00073 {
00074     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dpoMatrix")));
00075     int info, n;
00076 
00077     slot_dup(val, a, Matrix_DimSym);
00078     slot_dup(val, a, Matrix_uploSym);
00079     slot_dup(val, a, Matrix_diagSym);
00080     slot_dup(val, a, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00081     slot_dup(val, a, Matrix_xSym);
00082     n = *INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00083     F77_CALL(dpotri)(uplo_P(val), &n,
00084                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &n, &info);
00085     UNPROTECT(1);
00086     return val;
00087 }
00088 
00089 SEXP dtrMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00090 {
00091     SEXP ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00092     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00093         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym));
00094     int n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1];
00095     double one = 1.0;
00096 
00097     if (*adims != *bdims || bdims[1] < 1 || *adims < 1 || *adims != adims[1])
00098         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00099     F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", uplo_P(a), "N", diag_P(a),
00100                     &n, &nrhs, &one, REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), &n,
00101                     REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)), &n);
00102     UNPROTECT(1);
00103     return ans;
00104 }
00105 
00106 /* to bu used for all three: '%*%', crossprod() and tcrossprod() */
00107 SEXP dtrMatrix_matrix_mm(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP right, SEXP trans)
00108 {
00109     /* Because a must be square, the size of the answer, val,
00110      * is the same as the size of b */
00111     SEXP val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00112     int rt = asLogical(right); /* if(rt), compute b %*% op(a),  else  op(a) %*% b */
00113     int tr = asLogical(trans);/* if true, use t(a) */
00114     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00115         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00116     int m = bdims[0], n = bdims[1];
00117     double one = 1.;
00118 
00119     if (adims[0] != adims[1])
00120         error(_("dtrMatrix must be square"));
00121     if ((rt && adims[0] != n) || (!rt && adims[1] != m))
00122         error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00123     if (m < 1 || n < 1) {
00124 /*      error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied")); */
00125         } else /* BLAS */
00126         F77_CALL(dtrmm)(rt ? "R" : "L", uplo_P(a),
00127                         /*trans_A = */ tr ? "T" : "N",
00128                         diag_P(a), &m, &n, &one,
00129                         REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), adims,
00130                         REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &m);
00131     UNPROTECT(1);
00132     return val;
00133 }
00134 
00135 SEXP dtrMatrix_dtrMatrix_mm(SEXP a, SEXP b, SEXP right, SEXP trans)
00136 {
00137     /* to be called from "%*%" and crossprod(), tcrossprod(),
00138      * from  ../R/products.R
00139      *
00140      * TWO cases : (1) result is triangular  <=> uplo are equal
00141      * ===         (2) result is "general"
00142      */
00143     SEXP val,/* = in case (2):  PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b)); */
00144         d_a = GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym),
00145         uplo_a = GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_uploSym),
00146         diag_a = GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_diagSym);
00147     /* if(rt), compute b %*% a,  else  a %*% b */
00148     int rt = asLogical(right);
00149     int tr = asLogical(trans);/* if true, use t(a) */
00150     int *adims = INTEGER(d_a), n = adims[0];
00151     double *valx = (double *) NULL /*Wall*/;
00152     const char
00153         *uplo_a_ch = CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo_a, 0)), /* = uplo_P(a) */
00154         *diag_a_ch = CHAR(STRING_ELT(diag_a, 0)); /* = diag_P(a) */
00155     Rboolean same_uplo = (*uplo_a_ch == *uplo_P(b)), uDiag_b;
00156 
00157     if (INTEGER(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimSym))[0] != n)
00158         /* validity checking already "assures" square matrices ... */
00159         error(_("dtrMatrices in %*% must have matching (square) dim."));
00160     if(same_uplo) {
00161         /* ==> result is triangular -- "dtrMatrix" !
00162          * val := dup_mMatrix_as_dtrMatrix(b) : */
00163         int sz = n * n;
00164         val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtrMatrix")));
00165         SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo_a));
00166         SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym,  duplicate(d_a));
00167         SET_DimNames(val, b);
00168         valx = REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, sz));
00169         Memcpy(valx, REAL(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_xSym)), sz);
00170         if((uDiag_b = *diag_P(b) == 'U')) {
00171             /* unit-diagonal b - may contain garbage in diagonal */
00172             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00173                 valx[i * (n+1)] = 1.;
00174         }
00175     } else { /* different "uplo" ==> result is "dgeMatrix" ! */
00176         val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b));
00177     }
00178     if (n >= 1) {
00179         double alpha = 1.;
00180         /* Level 3 BLAS - DTRMM(): Compute one of the matrix multiplication operations
00181          * B := alpha*op( A )*B ["L"], or B := alpha*B*op( A ) ["R"],
00182          *      where trans_A determines  op(A):=  A   "N"one  or
00183          *                                op(A):= t(A) "T"ransposed */
00184         F77_CALL(dtrmm)(rt ? "R" : "L", uplo_a_ch,
00185                         /*trans_A = */ tr ? "T" : "N", diag_a_ch, &n, &n, &alpha,
00186                         REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), adims,
00187                         REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &n);
00188     }
00189     if(same_uplo) {
00190         make_d_matrix_triangular(valx, a); /* set "other triangle" to 0 */
00191         if(*diag_a_ch == 'U' && uDiag_b) /* result remains uni-diagonal */
00192             SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, duplicate(diag_a));
00193     }
00194     UNPROTECT(1);
00195     return val;
00196 }

00199 SEXP dtrMatrix_as_matrix(SEXP from, SEXP keep_dimnames)
00200 {
00201     int *Dim = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym));
00202     int m = Dim[0], n = Dim[1];
00203     SEXP val = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, m, n));
00204     make_d_matrix_triangular(Memcpy(REAL(val),
00205                                     REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), m * n),
00206                              from);
00207     if(asLogical(keep_dimnames))
00208         setAttrib(val, R_DimNamesSymbol, GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00209     UNPROTECT(1);
00210     return val;
00211 }
00212 
00213 #define GET_trMatrix_Diag(_C_TYPE_, _SEXPTYPE_, _SEXP_, _ONE_)          \
00214     int i, n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym))[0];                  \
00215     SEXP x_x = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym);                                \
00216                                                                         \
00217     SEXP ret = PROTECT(allocVector(_SEXPTYPE_, n));                     \
00218     _C_TYPE_ *rv = _SEXP_(ret),                                         \
00219              *xv = _SEXP_(x_x);                                         \
00220                                                                         \
00221     if ('U' == diag_P(x)[0]) {                                          \
00222         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) rv[i] = _ONE_;                          \
00223     } else {                                                            \
00224         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) rv[i] = xv[i * (n + 1)];                \
00225     }                                                                   \
00226     UNPROTECT(1);                                                       \
00227     return ret
00228

00230 SEXP dtrMatrix_getDiag(SEXP x) {
00231     GET_trMatrix_Diag(double, REALSXP, REAL, 1.);
00232 }

00234 SEXP ltrMatrix_getDiag(SEXP x) {
00235     GET_trMatrix_Diag(  int, LGLSXP, LOGICAL, 1);
00236 }

00238 SEXP dtrMatrix_as_dtpMatrix(SEXP from)
00239 {
00240     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtpMatrix"))),
00241         uplo = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_uploSym),
00242         diag = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_diagSym),
00243         dimP = GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_DimSym);
00244     int n = *INTEGER(dimP);
00245 
00246     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dimP));
00247     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_diagSym, duplicate(diag));
00248     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, duplicate(uplo));
00249     full_to_packed_double(
00250         REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, (n*(n+1))/2)),
00251         REAL(GET_SLOT(from, Matrix_xSym)), n,
00252         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(uplo, 0)) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW,
00253         *CHAR(STRING_ELT(diag, 0)) == 'U' ? UNT : NUN);
00254     UNPROTECT(1);
00255     return val;
00256 }
